## Methods

|  [bubbleIsVisible()](./blockly.ihasbubble_interface.bubbleisvisible_1_methodsignature.md) |  |
|  [getBubble()](./blockly.ihasbubble_interface.getbubble_1_methodsignature.md) | <p>Returns the current IBubble that implementations are managing, or null if there isn't one.</p><p>Note that this cannot be expected to return null if bubbleIsVisible() returns false, i.e., the nullability of the returned bubble does not necessarily imply visibility.</p> |
|  [setBubbleVisible(visible)](./blockly.ihasbubble_interface.setbubblevisible_1_methodsignature.md) | Sets whether the bubble is open or not. |
